SEARCH
Package gui

Class RestaurantSelectionController

java.lang.Object
gui.RestaurantSelectionController
public class RestaurantSelectionController extends Object
Controller class for the restaurant selection screen in the application. Handles the logic for selecting a restaurant and branch, and navigating between different screens in the GUI.
Version:
August 2024
Author:
Kfir Amoyal, Noam Furman, Israel Ohayon, Eitan Zerbel, Yaniv Shatil, Omri Heit

  • Method Details

    • loadUserCustomer

      public void loadUserCustomer(User UserClient)
      Loads the user data into the controller and initializes the restaurant orders. Fetches the list of restaurants from the server.
      Parameters:
      UserClient - The user object containing the user data.

    • loadRestaurant

      public void loadRestaurant(ArrayList<Restaurant> restaurants)
      Loads the list of restaurants into the controller.
      Parameters:
      restaurants - The list of restaurants to load.

    • updateRestaurantList

      public void updateRestaurantList()
      Updates the restaurant list in the ComboBox based on the selected branch.

    • reloadRestaurantsAndSetBranch

      public void reloadRestaurantsAndSetBranch()
      Reloads the restaurants and sets the branch in the ComboBox. Fetches the list of restaurants from the server.
